subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Probably analyzable as ''*ka-n'' (with nominalizing suffix ''-n''), from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*ka-j/w/m||to eat}} ({{zh-ref|Sagart, 2003}}). Compare Tamangic words for “food; cooked rice”: {{cog|taj|tr=¹kan}}, {{cog|tdg|tr=¹ken}}, {{cog|gvr|tr=¹kaẽ}}, {{cog|nmm|tr=¹kjɛ̃}}, {{cog|ths|tr=ᴴkʌn|t=}} (STEDT).
